column4: I'm considering reinstalling with i386-desktop. Jockey will NOT let me reinstall the nvidia blobs for my system. Elevating to root and activating them through jockey-gtk does absolutely nothing.
Screw it. I'm just going to try nouveau
Fluffles, they are in my apt-cache and there seems to be dependency issues. i'm aware of that method but I thought jockey used nvidia-common to detect issues ahhh nm let me try this
